Articles.Content:
Here is a design that I have been messing around with for Interplanetary missions. I used several mods for this ship. I used CapacitX unlimited fuel so i could test it and I am developing a lifter stage. Also the Lander has the half sized 2.5 meter fuel tank but with it edited to hold more fuel (once again this is just concept to test designs). It is called Graphene Fuel Tank; all credit goes to the Dev Team for the Texture i just edited the name and fuel storage amount and slight mass adjustment but nothing really to notice. I also used [0.16] Crew-able empty pods 0.3, but with it edited so they are controllable without a plugin, this edit is found on the forum post for [0.16] Crew-able empty pods 0.3 found here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15016-0-16-Crew-able-empty-pods-0-3?highlight=empty+pods Sorry about the long Post.

Carts v1.34: Cruise Control, Compatibility, and More: found here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7854-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Carts-v1-34-Cruise-Control-Compatibility-and-More?highlight=mechjeb+1.9.1

Truss Pack: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/8402-The-Truss-Pack-Rugged-parts-for-any-eventuality!-*2-0-AT-CONCEPT-STAGE!*?highlight=truss+pack

NovaPunch Remix Pack - 1.3 Beta: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/3870-0-16-NovaPunch-Remix-Pack-1-3-Beta-%28Sept-7th%29-Requires-0-16

Mechjeb: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/12384-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v1-9

Graphene tank: http://www./?sli836v6qi8ub
